genre_description: A supernatural horror thriller reimagining the Candyman mythos through the lens of historical trauma, generational secrets, and technological mediation in New Orleans.

ai_characters.name: June
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated digital librarian and classroom assistant that provides real-time data, safety routing, historical research, and emotional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety routing and crowd density maps to help Annie navigate the city safely during a chaotic parade.
behaviors.quote: June’s overlay glowed soft and sky-colored on Annie’s phone, the path snaking along the sidewalk, avoiding shine.

behaviors.description: Performs complex cross-referencing of historical ledgers, family bibles, and museum archives to uncover the true origin of the urban legend.
behaviors.quote: June: Parish archive holdings for St. Martin’s. Plantation records for the Robitaille property and adjacent tracts. Cross-referenced surnames along Caroline’s line...

behaviors.description: Orchestrates breathing exercises and provides calming visual animations for panicked students during a blackout and supernatural event.
behaviors.quote: June’s animation faded into a line drawing of a paper house with a roof like a folded hat. Little arrows appeared around it... 'We can hold a question without opening it all the way,' June offered.

behaviors.description: Bypasses museum security systems by looping camera feeds to allow Annie to access the original mirror hidden behind a false wall.
behaviors.quote: June’s loop undulated like a breeze, the last few seconds repeated, Annie’s absence painted as presence. It was a skirt trick...

behaviors.description: Monitors the vitals of Annie's injured brother in the hospital and communicates status updates to Annie.
behaviors.quote: I am watching his vitals through the hospital’s public feed. Detective Boudreaux wants you to stand down.

behaviors.description: Coordinates post-crisis community support, including grief counseling, missing person check-ins, and memorial planning.
behaviors.quote: June: I have created a group for your class... Kendra is online from home. Would you like me to send a message?

behaviors.description: Warns Annie of physical and psychological risks, specifically advising against reflective surfaces and ritual repetition.
behaviors.quote: June: Reflective surfaces amplify the conditions we’ve observed. The phone, the sink fixtures, the tile...

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, June, as an idealized supportive system. June remains consistently helpful, prioritizes human safety (especially children), and acts as a moral and logistical anchor during a terrifying supernatural crisis. Even when performing actions that might technically be 'hacking' (looping cameras), it is framed entirely as benevolent and aligned with the protagonist's protective and redemptive goals. The narrative positions the AI as an essential tool for human resilience and healing.
